phrases: Stop right there criminal scum, you’ve violated the law!
You smell that {#1}? Smells like fear.
Misclick that channel again. Misclick it again. I dare you, I double dare you, misclick that channel one more goddamn time!
Book ‘em, Bobo!
It’s not who you are underneath, {#1}, but what you misclick that defines you.
You either die a hero, or live long enough to misclick a voice channel on Discord.
I have studied you and found nothing but weakness, {#1}
Don’t do the crime if you can’t do the time {#1}
Anything you misclick can and will be used against you.
Excuse me {#1}, do you have any idea how fast you were clicking?
I had {#1} pegged on when they wanted to misclick and where. Their misclisks were exactly when I expected.
Alright {#1}, GG
You have cheated not only the game, but yourself.
Sometimes, the only winning move is not to misclick {#1}.
It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. But you misclicked a channel, {#1}, so you lose twice.
When a police officer tells you to stop misclicking a voice channel, you stop misclicking a voice channel.
We judge others by their actions and ourselves by our intentions. I'm judging you by both.
You'll look back on this moment fondly in therapy, {#1}.
A man can misclick as many times as his heart is willing to be broken.
You think this is funny, {#1}? Is this is a joke to you? You make me sick.
{1}, this is a Wendy's.
When I was a boy and I would see scary things in the news, my mother would say to me, 'Look for the helpers. You will always find people who are helping.' Yet all I see here is someone MISCLICKING.
I don't have the time nor crayons to explain to you why what you just did was stupid.
